announcement.title: Announce a sale or a new product line using this announcement bar.

heading.info: The heading will only appear when products are showing.
heading.label: Heading

product_source.info: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)
product_source.label: Products to show

products_list.info: Add a [product reference](/admin/metafields/product/create) (list of products) metafield to set different items for each product
products_list.label: Custom product list

enable_contrast.info: Configure Contrast section colors in Theme settings
enable_contrast.label: Enable contrast

enable_payment_button.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button

show_swatches.info: Add swatch image files to your store's [files area](/admin/settings/files). Make sure the file names match the names of your color variants. For example, a variant called Blue would need a file called 'blue.png'
show_swatches.label: Show swatches

enable_contrast.info: Configure Contrast section colors in Theme settings
enable_contrast.label: Enable contrast

image.info: We recommend using an image where the height is greater than the width.
image.label: Image

title.info: We strongly recommend including a heading because it functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

title.info: We strongly recommend including a heading because it functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

title.info: We strongly recommend including a heading because it functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header_payment_types.info: Only icons for payment types that your store supports will be shown.

header_social_media.info: Configure account links in theme settings.

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the Mega nav to appear from. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/header/#set-up-a-mega-nav-menu)
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the Mega nav to appear from. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/header/#set-up-a-mega-nav-menu)
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the dropdown to appear from. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/header/#set-up-a-mega-nav-menu)
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

enable_transparent_collection.info: This setting requires that you have Collection images and have enabled full-width within your Collection pages Section.
enable_transparent_collection.label: Enable on collection pages

enable_transparent_home.info: This setting requires that you have a Slideshow Section with full-width enabled as the first Section on your homepage.
enable_transparent_home.label: Enable on home page

logo_transparent.info: If no logo is set here it will use the default logo image instead
logo_transparent.label: Logo image

enable_contrast.info: Configure Contrast section colors in Theme settings
enable_contrast.label: Enable contrast

image.info: We recommend using an image where the height is greater than the width.
image.label: Image

video_url.info: Direct link to .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/image-with-text/#add-a-video-to-an-image-with-text-section).
video_url.label: Video link

settings.explanation: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

blog_show_pagination.info: Pagination will appear when you have multiple blog articles to display
blog_show_pagination.label: Show pagination

cart_show_notes.info: Allows customers to enter a note before checkout
cart_show_notes.label: Enable cart notes

pagination.info: This setting determines how additional pages of products are navigated.
pagination.label: Pagination

header_full_width_styles.info: These settings only apply when the collection image style is set to 'Full width image'

image_position.info: If the image is cropped this part will remain visible.
image_position.label: Collection image position

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

image.info: Use an image with a 2:3 width to height ratio (recommended).
image.label: Image

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Accordion heading

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/product-pages#inventory-counter)
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/product-pages)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

show_untracked_quantity.label: Use "In stock" status for untracked quantities

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Content

variant_popup_show_title.label: Show page title in popup modal

enable_sticky_sidebar.info: Keep the sidebar fixed when customers scroll through product images. A short product form is recommended.
enable_sticky_sidebar.label: Enable sticky sidebar

enable_contrast.info: Configure Contrast section colors in Theme settings
enable_contrast.label: Enable contrast

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/spark/video-hero#add-a-video).
video_url.label: Video link

settings.note: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the “accepts marketing” [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

decline_age_link.info: Link to where users will be sent if they don't agree to the age verification. The default is your stores password page.
decline_age_link.label: Decline button link

paragraph__customization.content: Product recommendations are dynamically generated or can be manually assigned with the Shopify Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

paragraph__intro.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

video_url.info: Direct link to .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/ira/slideshow/#add-a-video-to-a-slideshow).
video_url.label: Video link

cart_quick_shop_show_quantity.info: If quantity inputs are hidden, quantities will default to 1.
cart_quick_shop_show_quantity.label: Show quick shop quantity input

contrast__header.info: Choose "Use alternate section color" at the bottom of a section's settings to use this secondary color scheme there.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

chip_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying chips. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Size, Material, Fabric".
chip_options.label: Variant option for chips

swatch_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Colour"
swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches

enable_full_width.info: If enabled this section will span the entire width of the window
enable_full_width.label: Enable full width
